snippet: Reggie Miller said that it would “take almost an act of God” for any team to beat the Wildcats, which led Pirates Coach Edward Joyner Jr. to say he “had Jesus on speed dial.”
abstract: NCAA Tournament Notebook; Hampton defeats Manhattan, 74-64, in men's NCAA basketball tournament opener, advancing to face undefeated Kentucky; other tournament news noted.
lead_paragraph: Reggie Miller said that it would “take almost an act of God” for any team to beat the Wildcats, which led Pirates Coach Edward Joyner Jr. to say he “had Jesus on speed dial.”

headline.main: Hampton Hopes for Divine Intervention Against Kentucky
headline.print_headline: Kentucky’s Opponent Hopes for Divine Intervention; Harvard Aims for an Upset
